original_text: And Zechariah said to the angel, “How shall I know this? For I am an old man, and my wife is advanced in years.”
korean_text: 사가랴가 천사에게 이르되 내가 이것을 어떻게 알리요 내가 늙고 아내도 나이가 많으니이다

sentences.original_text: And Zechariah said to the angel,
For I am an old man,
and my wife is advanced in years.
